Address: 30A BELMONT ROAD WEST CROYDON SOUTH VIC 3136
Description:
LOVE AT FIRST SIGHT
30A BELMONT ROAD WEST, CROYDON SOUTH/CROYDON
It'll be love at first sight with this enchanting home that combines the best of Federation design with modern comforts to create a wonderful and low-maintenance lifestyle. Set peacefully at the rear of a subdivided block, its character filled interior boasts an inviting lounge with open fire & bar. A well appointed timber kitchen with adjoining family/meals area, warmed by Coonara, leading out to large entertaining deck and private courtyard garden. Two bedrooms plus bathroom are privately positioned on the ground level, while the master bedroom with WIR & ensuite indulges you with your own private retreat upstairs. Included are ducted heating, evaporative cooling and remote control double garage. Eastfield shops & Cheong Park, Tintern Girls Grammar, primary schools, transport and Eastlink are all within close proximity.
NOTE: Photo ID required for all Open Home Inspections

Description:
A Family-Friendly Zone
The original house on an approximately 645sqm subdivided block, this beautiful 3 bedroom home presents a superb family environment. Harmonising with the spacious interior and high ceilings, polished boards blend with a fresh, neutral colour palette and ornate light fixtures. A large formal lounge, warmed by an open fireplace, accesses the bedrooms, well-equipped kitchen and meals area. Central to the generously sized bedrooms (each with BIRs, the master with ensuite), a large living area may be utilised as a parent’s retreat or a rumpus room. Providing adequate room for kids and pets, the private backyard also houses a handy garden shed. Enjoying prime position at the end of a quiet court, the family friendly location places the home within walking distance of a playground, Tinternvale Primary School and in easy reach of shops.
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
Made For Families
Vibrant, manicured gardens bookend this 3 bedroom plus study/ fourth bedroom federation-style home made for families. Soft décor harmonises with luxuriously draped bay windows to create an upbeat, light-filled atmosphere. Featuring 2 separately zoned living areas, the layout divides the formal lounge and dining (replete with a built in TV and display cabinet and surround sound) from the casual meals and family room overseen by the well-equipped kitchen. Perfect family zoning places the spacious master (with walk-in robe and ensuite) at the front of the house and the remaining bedrooms and study at the other, allowing parents a veritable retreat. Outside, a verdant paradise awaits, catering for alfresco dining, entertaining and reclining. Established plantation skirts the fence line, creating absolute privacy, while a paved undercover outdoor living area is overseen by a built-in barbeque. The lawn, a perfect place for young imaginations to run wild, is punctuated by an elegant garden feature. Convenience is only a short stroll away courtesy of local shops, bus route and schools. Features: solid-wood cabinet with retractable doors, Tastic heating lights in bathrooms, spa bath, surround sound inside & out, alarm system, ducted vacuum, ducted heating, Breezaire air-conditioning, downlights, sprinkler system, double automatic garage.
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
Just A Walk In The Park
The seamless presentation of this 3 bedroom abode is a warm welcome with plenty more to explore inside. With ducted heating and ducted air conditioning the lounge is a cosy space to lay about and catch up on your favourite TV programs or a perhaps a good book, with more everyday family living to be enjoyed in the open plan family, meals and kitchen which is complete with a gas oven/cook top and a dishwasher. There are 2 bathrooms to service the bedrooms; the family bathroom has been on the receiving end of a make-over , including a semi frameless shower and a stylish vanity. All the bedrooms have ideal storage space in their built in robes and are a generous size, even for growing teenagers. Also including ducted heating and ducted air conditioning. If you're after the wow factor, wait until you see the enormous indoor/outdoor living room. Constantina doors open out to invite the natural sunlight and fresh air in, and again close when the weather isn't so good. Powered and heated, this room is simply sensational! The surrounding gardens are delightful and include 2 work sheds and the convenience of a double carport. Just across the road, the kids play ground will keep the little ones entertained all day long, while nearby Croydon Main Street, transportation and local schools are all within easy reach.
NOTE: Photo ID required for all Open Home Inspections

Description:
A Prime Opportunity
Located in the coveted Tintern precinct and set amongst vibrant gardens, this neatly presented home on approx 890sqm is ideal for the home buyer, developer and investor. Complemented by subtle vintage décor, arched doorways, ornate light fixtures and polished boards, the functional layout distinctly divides the living areas from the sleeping quarters: a large sunken lounge room lies adjacent to the formal dining room which leads to an orderly kitchen and meals area complete with an island breakfast bench. Well-sized, the bedrooms each benefit from built-in robes and share a bright bathroom – the master possesses ‘his and hers’ robes and an ensuite. The lush yard is overseen by a paved alfresco dining area and covered verandah – a private place to entertain or recline. Conveniently located, the home is in easy proximity of East Ringwood shops and station, local schools, transport and parks. Features: double garage, gas ducted heating & air-conditioning unit.
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
Low Maintenance is the Key
Superbly located on a corner allotment, this renovated residence holds the key to low maintenance living. Surrounded by a family-friendly environment close to Cheong and Eastfield Park, Tintern Girls Grammar, Tinternvale Primary and transport services, this rendered residence is well suited to first home buyers keen to make a fabulous first impression, young families or the retiree/empty nester who desire comfort and convenience. Featuring a well executed floorplan, the home offers the distinct advantage of a light-filled interior and has been immaculately maintained to an exceptional standard. Warm and welcoming, the home creates a harmonious environment for all to enjoy and is enhanced by a generous sized lounge that flows effortlessly into the air conditioned casual meals area. Opening into an efficiently designed kitchen that enjoys all the modern conveniences, the home is dedicated to please and boasts three robed bedrooms, a flawless main bathroom with updated appointments and powder room facilities. Designed for today's modern family, the home showcases absolute perfection and includes a private rear yard with small deck, garden shed and an impressive display of beautiful garden delights. With so much appeal, the home features polished timber floors, gas ducted heating and a double carport.
Guaranteed to impress from the moment you step inside, be quick. First to see will buy!
Maureen Payne : 0410 529 849

Description:
BEST OF BOTH WORLDS
This well presented home has enough yard for entertaining and for the kids and pets to enjoy, without having to spend weekends slaving away in the garden!
Perfect for the first home buyer, empty nester, retiree, young couple or investor, the home is located only moments to Tintern Girls Grammar, Tinternvale Primary and the convenience of Cheong and Eastfield Park with local transport and shops at your door. Offering all that you need to make a new start, this delightfully presented property is guaranteed to please and will make you feel immediately at home as soon as you step inside. Enjoying a great big lounge room and a sunny casual meals area adjoining the nicely appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, the home features 2 robed bedrooms and includes a main bedroom suite with extra large walk-in-robe and two way bathroom access. Experiencing the ultimate in low maintenance living, the home includes a sizeable, fully fenced backyard ideal for the kids to play with total freedom, security and safety in mind. Complete with a single carport and gas ducted heating, this fabulous property will not last long. Call now!
Brett Freeman

Description:
Family investment
Presenting a charming large brick veneer family home with comfortable rear accommodation that provides excellent dual investment potential, or the perfect private set up for young adults or relatives living still at home. Hardwood timber floors grace the spacious gas heated interior, dining is included in the sleek well appointed kitchen, the bathroom with separate shower is fresh and bright, strategic skylights abound and parking is a breeze. Behind secure high fencing this is an opportunity too good to miss. Stroll to shops, and kinder, Eastfield park is close by, it’s a rare win, win.

Description:
A Fresh Start
Minimum upkeep and maximum style make this brand new 3 bedroom home impossible to pass up. Set securely at the back of the block, the home is skirted by landscaped gardens and high fences which create privacy. A fresh, neutral colour palette contrasts nicely with polished timber flooring. Providing formal and informal living options, the sundrenched open dining and lounge lead onto a decking and are overseen by a striking black and white kitchen. Enjoying a private patio, the master bedroom is separately zoned from the remaining bedrooms and fitted with a walk-in robe and ensuite. Close to schools, parks and Eastfield shops, this home presents a fresh start and a promising future.
Features:
• Kitchen with stainless-steel appliances
• Downlights throughout
• Modern bathrooms
• Ducted heating/cooling
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

The Search Is Over
This family-focused entertainer, offering relaxed living and contemporary style, is the one you’ve been looking for! The striking interior is hallmarked by crisp, clean lines complemented by bold decor incorporating floating floors and sleek tiling. Catering for aesthetics and functionality, the kitchen is decked out with modern stainless-steel appliances and high benches. Enjoying close proximity to modern necessities such as Tinternvale Primary School, parkland, walking tracks and shops, this remarkable home will not disappoint.

Description:
Light & Bright, Fantastic Site
Made for those that like space and light, this radiant 3 bedroom unit is a rare find offering room to move and grow. The spacious, open-plan lounge, dining and kitchen area is bathed in light throughout, owing to large floor-level windows. Fulfilling every chef’s needs, the U-shaped, timber kitchen features stainless-steel appliances, vast granite benches, storage and even a pantry sensor light! The master bedroom is a particular delight, offering a WIR, ensuite and individual downlights above each side of the bed (with separate switches just a hand stretch away). Outdoor fun becomes endless with the alluring, landscaped gardens featuring 2 paved entertaining areas (with external lighting).
Additional appointments include: gas ducted heating, an air conditioning cooling system in the lounge room, downlights throughout, double lock-up garage, extra storage space on sub floor in garage roof.
Located around the corner from Belmont and Woodland parks and local shops, this gorgeous home offers the ideal lifestyle/location package within several minutes drive from Eastland Shopping Centre.
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Address: 102 Belmont Road East Croydon South VIC 3136
Description:
Room To Grow
Not just a standard family abode, this comfortable 4 bedroom home provides ample space for an established or expanding brood. The practical layout sees the formal lounge and children’s rooms zoned towards the front of the house and the master and family living area at the rear. Slate tiles feature inside and out, adding textural warmth and character. The open kitchen is a fantastic workspace with its wide benches – perfect for casual meals, an upright gas stove and dishwasher. The spacious backyard is a prominent feature with its circular lawn, established plantation, cubby and garden shed. The double remote garage includes a workshop perfect for home businesses. The home is located opposite parkland and close to a variety of schools. Merrindale Shopping Centre is within easy walking distance.
Features
• Evaporative cooling
• Ducted heating
• Ducted vacuum
• Master bedroom with WIR, mirrored BIR & ensuite
• Bedrooms with BIRS
Presented By PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
No Fuss. No Clutter.
Minimalist lines and open plan design make this 4 bedroom home a family friendly entertainer. The parents bedroom, complete with ensuite and walk-in robe, is a virtual retreat, zoned far away from the kids rooms. The kitchen is a hostess’ dream and a prominent feature with its meter wide oven, walk-in pantry and large workspace. From this position, the cook can easily interact with family and friends in the casual dining and family/media room. Outside entertaining is made simple with a paved undercover barbeque area complemented by a modern feature wall. Set in a secure neighbourhood, close to kindergartens and quality schools such as Tintern Girls Grammar and Tinternvale Primary School, this home is easy to maintain so you can spend more time with the people most important to you.

• Double garage with remote control door

Address: 7 Blue Mist Drive Croydon South VIC 3136
Description:
Work From Home Without Taking Work Home
If you’re a tradesman or run your own business you will not want to miss this chance to operate from home. A delightful house occupies a large block and comes equipped with a 6 car garage (with wood heater) that could be easily utilised as a work or storage space. The garage has direct access to a ready-to-go home office with phone, internet, broadband connection and a split system unit for year round comfort. Inside the home you’ll find 2 versatile living areas for your formal and informal entertaining needs, a bright kitchen/meals space, 3 privately zoned bedrooms and a family friendly bathroom with separate toilet and shower. Ideal for year round recreation, an undercover verandah hosts an in-ground spa and overlooks the vast rear yard.
The separate work station means that you can work from home without having to take your work home and those with families will appreciate not having to compromise their family’s lifestyle.
Features:
• Ready-to-go home office
• 6 car garage/home work space with wood heater
• 2 versatile living zones
• In-ground spa with surrounding timber decking
• Gas ducted heating
• Evaporative cooling
• Alarm system
Land Size: 980 SQM APPROX

Description:
Subdivision Potential (STCA) on 870SQM (approx)
This delightful property is set in a truly outstanding location directly opposite Eastfield Park, close to schools, buses and shopping. Lending weight to all manner of renovation ideas, the house features a large North-facing front verandah, perfect for lazy Sunday morning coffee with views across the park. The sun-filled, L-shaped lounge and living area, leads to an immaculate and functional kitchen, adjoining the spacious formal dining area offering an abundance of entertaining options. Featuring 2 main bedrooms with BIRs, a 3rd flexible bedroom/study/game room, covered entertainment deck and an accommodating backyard bungalow, the property totals approximately 870sqm and has subdivision potential (subject to council approval). The textbook investment location creates exceptional possibilities for the astute investor/developer.

Description:
Dewpond Paradise
This is more than just a private, parkside home, it is a lifestyle. The floorplan is easily reinstated to include a third bedroom. The year-round entertaining spaces, inside and out, provide plenty of space to gather friends and family. In the L-shaped lounge and dining there is comfort and warmth by the open fireplace, while the open plan living/dining room opens onto the decking with garden views. Recently updated with new appliances the kitchen’s central position is ideal for busy mornings and a breakfast bar is great for casual meals.
The garden is an oasis from your hectic day with plenty of room for kids and pets to run around. A flourishing koi fish pond and fountain creates a relaxing backdrop for the undercover decking, while the garden plays host to a vegie patch, fully-powered garage/workshop and great underhouse storage.
Walk to shops, schools and bus routes within minutes.
Features:
• ducted heating
• ceiling fans throughout
• reverse-cycle AC in formal lounge
• dishwasher
• speakers and ceiling fan to the deck
• secure car accommodation
• study/store room
• ample storage throughout
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
Easy Location, Loads Of Potential
In a handy location this 3 bedroom home, on a generous 860SQM, has subdivision potential (subject to council approval). The interior boasts a roomy lounge and dining room, master bedroom with mirrored robes, central bathroom and two further bedrooms. The central kitchen and meals area opens out to the rear undercover entertaining area and large backyard.
There are some fantastic local landmarks that will offer residents a handy, walk-to-it-all lifestyle:
• Tintern Girls Grammar
• Croydon South Primary School (end of Homer Ave)
• Eastfield Park
• Merrindale Shopping Centre
• Croydon train station
• Croydon main street is really only a short drive away
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
The Perfect Family Home
A superb opportunity now exists to purchase a fabulous family home surrounded by parkland, walking tracks, reserves and schooling opportunities. Well positioned, the home is serviced by 3 bedrooms plus a study (master with walk in robe and ensuite facilities) and is generously accommodated with a spacious formal lounge and dining room enhanced by a bay window allowing the natural light to stream in, a comfortable kitchen with gas cooking facilities providing the focus for family activities and a sizeable meals/family room integrating perfectly to the outdoor paved entertaining zone. Offering modern appeal, the home is enhanced by gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm system, a delightful backyard framed by manicured gardens and a garden shed ideal for all your tools. Offering every convenience, the home enjoys a double lock-up garage with built-in shelving and is loaded with ample off street parking potential. PERFECT for first home buyers, families or investors, call today to arrange your inspection.
James Brougham : 0412 620 498

Description:
Move In or Add To Your Portfolio
Positioned within one of the most convenient locations, this 3 bedroom weatherboard home is nestled behind a white picket fence on a corner allotment of 615sqm (approx). Located with easy proximity to Eastfield and Cheong Parks, shopping, elite schools including Tintern Girls Grammar, transport and bike and walking tracks, the home is loaded with appeal and offers the perfect blend of old and new. Whether you are looking for your next real estate transaction to be for work or play, the home is well suited to the first home buyer keen to make a fabulous first impression, the wise investor (currently rented to an excellent tenant keen to stay on) or the young couple with a focus on family. Riddled with character, the home enjoys good-sized bedrooms, a purposeful kitchen with banks of cupboard space and stainless steel benchtops, a casual meals area drenched in natural light and a cosy lounge room with gas heating and reverse cycle air conditioner to enhance your summer comfort. Boasting a central bathroom with neat and clean amenities and a timber vanity unit, the home is enhanced by golden-toned floorboards, decorative cornices and a front patio - perfect for enjoying your morning coffee. Featuring a rear covered area that surveys the fully fenced backyard, the home is highlighted by established gardens and includes a garden shed, double gate access to the block and a single carport with roller door for your added security. Whatever your intention, this exciting opportunity demands your immediate inspection.
Geoff Thompson
